synopsis.text:
He possesses an extraordinary ability to perceive 'flags' that signify pivotal moments in people's lives, such as love, friendship, or even death. Meet Hatate Souta, a high school student who, following a traumatic ship accident, has chosen to live in isolation, fearing that misfortune will befall those close to him. However, his solitary life takes a dramatic turn when he transfers to the prestigious Hatagaya Academy in Tokyo.

Instead of residing in the boys' dormitory, Souta finds himself sharing a roof with not one, but five captivating girls. His unique ability captures the attention of one of his classmates, Nanami Knight Bladefield, who becomes determined to unravel the mystery behind his power. Despite his initial reluctance to form connections, Nanami promises to remain by his side, regardless of the consequences.

As he navigates through his new life, Souta encounters an additional seven intriguing girls, all drawn to his peculiar lifestyle. Together, they begin to reside in the school dorm, marking the beginning of a journey filled with unforeseen events and revelations about the depth of Souta's ability. Will Souta be able to overcome his past and embrace the flags that guide his future? Only time will tell in this engaging and suspenseful tale.
